author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...LORENZO POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 17.3, -44.1 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE CENTRAL TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Tue Oct 14 the center of Lorenzo was located near 17.3, -44.1 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
